user_query: Lanning built you no but I believe my father made me for a purpose we all have a purpose don't you think Detective please take this I have a feeling it may mean more to you than to me why is that because the man in my dream the one standing on the hill it is not me it is you [Music] toward the end of his life Alfred was becoming increasingly Disturbed who knows why he built this one abomination one those things are running the streets in packs of Boston are you aware of the man you're blindly escorting around our building has a documented history of savage violence against robots robots for protection for any idea what this one robot could do completely shatter human faith in robotics what if the public knew just imagine the mass recalls all because of an irrational paranoia and Prejudice Susan just be logical your life's work has been the development and integration of robots but whatever you feel just think is one robot worth the loss of all that we've gained I'll do it myself [Music] in his fives wait outside I'm so sorry Sonny [Music] and now will be reclaimed for the storage of robotic workers it's just another way USR is improving our world is that microscopic robots designed to wipe out artificial synapses yeah they look like me but none of them are me isn't that right doctor right you are unique [Music] will it hurt [Music] why is it that when some robots are left in darkness they will seek out Delight [Music] when robots are stored in an empty space they will group

entities.entity_description: Lanning은 로봇을 만든 인물로, 아버지로 언급되며 말년에 점점 불안정해졌다고 묘사된다
Sonny는 Lanning이 만든 독특한 로봇으로, 꿈을 꾸고 목적의식을 가진 특별한 존재이다
Detective는 Sonny와 대화하는 형사로, Sonny의 꿈에서 언덕 위에 서 있는 인물로 묘사된다
Susan은 로봇 개발과 통합에 평생을 바친 과학자로, 로봇공학에 대한 신뢰와 한 로봇 사이에서 갈등한다
USR은 로봇 노동자를 저장하고 세상을 개선한다고 주장하는 로봇 회사이다
Alfred는 Lanning의 이름으로 추정되며, 말년에 점점 불안정해지면서 특별한 로봇을 만들었다

relationships.relationship_description: Lanning은 Sonny를 특별한 목적을 위해 만든 창조자이다
Sonny는 Detective에게 의미 있는 물건을 건네며, 자신의 꿈에서 Detective가 언덕 위에 서 있다고 말한다
Susan은 Sonny를 파괴해야 하는 상황에서 미안함을 표현하며 갈등한다
Alfred와 Lanning은 동일 인물로 추정되며, 로봇을 만든 창조자이다
Detective는 로봇에 대한 폭력적 이력이 있으며 Sonny를 호송하는 역할을 한다
